column1: City Planning & Real Estate Development - MSc
column5: This unique degree programme brings together the disciplines of city planning and real estate development in a concentrated year of study. It will prepare you for working either as a planner or real estate surveyor while also ensuring that you develop an in-depth appreciation of how different stakeholders in the planning and real estate sectors make decisions about future places.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full-time; 2 years part-time; up to 5 years modular study
